The combat is intense\, visceral and impactful. Part II takes notes from MGS5 by making combat feel more fluid and offering more control to the player while still feeling measured and realistic. The level design offers the player more choice over how you approach fights and ensures you always have a path open to you even when things go south.The presentation is best in class for the PS4 and the soundtrack is incredibly powerful throughout\, lending it's hand to enhance many memorable moments and encounters.Part II is an outstanding showcase for acting in videogames. Ashly Johnson gets some incredible writing to work off of and does not waste a single opportunity to show why she's considered one of the industry's best performers. Laura Bailey also produces the best performance I've seen in all her gaming roles.It's an absolutely unforgettable experience from beginning to end- a twisted journey of heartwarming highs and crushing lows that will leave you emotionally drained as the credits roll. The Last of Us Part II is a truly great achievement in gaming narrative and a testament to how this medium can use it's unique mechanics to provoke a strong emotional response from it's players.… Expand
